data.title: Refresh Man
data.meta_description: Refresh Man (後菜鳥的燦爛時代; Hòu Càiniǎo De Cànlàn Shídài; lit. The After-Rookie's Brilliant Era) is a 2016 Taiwanese television series created by SET TV starring Aaron Yan, Joanne Tseng, Lene Lai and Jack Lee as the main cast. Filming began on January 27, 2016 and is filmed as it airs. The drama...
data.text: Episode Aired Average audience share Episode 01 March 6, 2016 1.69% (1st) Anticipating her first ever promotion, Zhong Yu Tang gets the shock of her life when her childhood classmate, who had always had the lowest grades in the class, is introduced as the new CEO. Episode 02 March 13, 2016 1.84% (1st) Zhong Yu Tang tries to make the best of her situation and tries to rally Sales Team C to be better. Wen Kai is determined to get back at Yu Tang for all the mean things she did to him when they were kids. Episode 03 March 20, 2016 2.22% (1st) When Jia Yin's son is sick, Yu Tang steps up to help her out and learns about Jia Yin's family. Wen Kai agrees to help Yu Tang learn how to be a saleswoman. Episode 04 March 27, 2016 2.26% (1st) Wen Kai figures out how Yu Tang managed to save the Mei Mei contract with Di Shi Kang. Yu Tang manages to convince Sales Team C to put some effort into the Yours project. Episode 05 April 3, 2016 2.35% (1st) Wen Kai takes care of Yu Tang after she falls into his pool, and then Yu Tang takes care of him when he gets sick. Wen Kai is jealous when Yu Tang meets another man for breakfast. Episode 06 April 10, 2016 2.59% (1st) Wen Kai blows off a birthday dinner with Ai Sha to rescue Yu Tang. Sales Team C comes to Yu Tang's defense when she is bullied. Episode 07 April 17, 2016 2.38% (1st) Yu Tang tells Sales Team C about her meeting with Auntie Ping and Wen Kai plans to take Sales Team C out to lunch to celebrate. More and more people seem tell Yu Tang and Wen Kai that they would make a great couple. Episode 08 April 24, 2016 2.65% (1st) Yu Tang comes up with a way to make Mei Mei relevant again. Sales Team A challenges Sales Team C to meet a sales goal. Episode 09 May 1, 2016 2.42% (1st) Yu Tang struggles to remember what happened last night, and she starts to realize how much Wen Kai has been doing to help her. Sales Team C figures out a marketing strategy for New Mei Mei. Episode 10 May 8, 2016 2.38% (1st) New Mei Mei samples are available and Sales Team C conducts blind tests to see what people think. Ai Sha finally shares her feelings with Wen Kai. Episode 11 May 15, 2016 2.91% (1st) Zi Yu and Wen Kai confess their feelings to Yu Tang. Zhong Kuei reopens his restaurant. Episode 12 May 22, 2016 2.85% (1st) Sales Team C goes out to get orders for New Mei Mei. Yu Tang tries to keep her relationship a secret. Episode 13 May 29, 2016 2.63% (1st) Sales Team C finds out about Yu Tang and Wen Kai. When New Mei Mei's sales hit a plateau, Sales Team C has to consider more creative sales ideas. Episode 14 June 5, 2016 2.47% (1st) Yu Tang and Wen Kai compare stories from high school. Jia Yin goes to Singapore and helps Sales Team C win the bet. Episode 15 June 12, 2016 2.44% (1st) Manager Jia accuses Wen Kai of putting his personal relationship before the good of the company. Counterfeit Mei Mei starts showing up all over Taiwan. Episode 16 June 19, 2016 2.46% (1st) Sales Team C steps up after Sales Team A and B quit. Zi Yu tries again to convince Yu Tang to come work for him and to leave Wen Kai. Episode 17 June 26, 2016 2.87% (1st) Yu Tang has a tough time staying strong for her last day with Wen Kai. Wen Kai has one more trick up his sleeve.
